name: Little Lords of Twilight
description:
Little Lords of Twilight is a visually stunning PvP turn-based strategy game, where champions from different worlds battle head-to-head for control of The Portals.-- SETTING --
Each time the sun hides behind one of the moons of Zikverländ and when it emerges to shine anew, you will be transformed and lent formidable powers. But listen well Hero: although you must bow to the rule of NightFalls and SunPops, your soul yearns to be free.-- FEATURES --
1- Defeat Opponents in Turn-Based Duels
2- Build a Winning Deck
3- Master the Day & Night Cycles
4- Climb the Leaderboard
5- Compete in Epic Worlds-- DETAILS --
  • Duel players from around the world in epic PvP battles
  • Play a mix of turn-based strategy mechanics, card collectibles and the tactical genre
  • Unlock new hero abilities and skins
  • Collect powerful new spells and build a winning deck
  • Master day & night cycles mechanics and influence the entire gameplay strategies
  • Climb up the leaderboard and earn the Overlord title
  • Defeat your friends in 1v1 showdowns
